body:
I relly like to avicus put on the avicus maps rot some "MineLoL" maps

What is minelol?
 
Minelol is a mode of game who you will have the max. gear possible, its perfect for doing kills.
There are some towers for coming back to spawn, for trading with the villagers, and having gear.

Possible maps:

Necro, By Draco_Rouge

A map of Team Deathmatch using the villagers trade.

Icescar, By Lyzak

A map of DTM (destroy the monument) using the villagers trade too

(there are more maps, but the page who i download it, is offline, when its online, i'll try to explain better the maps)
I hope what the idea likes the admin, so i really wont minelol on avicus. And sorry for my english, im spanish

Att:

0V3R_P0W3R

title: MineLoL on avicus?
